title: [1.7.10][ssp][smp]Iron Furnaces—— 更多熔炉—开始熔炼仙丹吧！
txt_content:
这个mod拥有许多的不同材料的熔炉！每个熔炉都有自己所要的材料！以及不同的速度！目前含有铁,黄金,钻石,和黑曜石炉,每个熔炉都有自己不同的速度。



合成表Iron FurnaceBurn time of 150 ticks. The regular furnace has a burn time of 200 ticks.
Gold FurnaceBurn time of 100 ticks.
Diamond FurnaceBurn time of 50 ticks.
Obsidian FurnaceThe same burn time as the diamond furnace, except with a blast resistance of 6,000.
Crystal Furnace:A little fast than the Obsidian, or Diamond Furnaces.

下载地址http://pan.baidu.com/s/1i4kzUOP

replies.author: LIAG
replies.txt_content:
这个MOD在MC中文下载站上早就有了！
http://www.minecraftxz.com/18xgengduoronglumorefurnacesmod
而且别人的介绍比你详细多了！
